root.name: Fiesta
root.description: Overview Fiesta is a free-to-play MMORPG that is set in the fantasy realm of Isya. The game has 5 servers and 4 different character classes to choose from. A notable difference that sperates this from others of its genre is the addition of the Kingdom Quest (KQ) which allows up to 15 players to complete a certain objective. The World The events of Fiesta take place on the continent called Isya. There are three towns in Isya; Roumen (The town you start in), Elderine and Uruga. Elderine is the largest of the three towns. There are also areas where players can go to kill monsters for exp and loot , there are places like these around every town. There are also dungeon locations that are placed for certain level ranges called abyss dungeons. Only players that are in within a certain level range can access a certain abyss dungeon; there is one of these areas for every nine levels. For example, only players level 30- 39 can access a dungeon with monsters designed too present a suitable challenge for them. Character Classes Fiesta has 4 basic character classes when you first create your character. However. the game offers chances to upgrade you class with more powerful abilities at levels 20, 60 and 100. Fighter CleverFighter- Level 20 Warrior- Level 60 Gladiator or Knight- Level 100 ClericHigh Cleric- Level 20 Paladin- Level 60 Holy Knight or Guardian- Level 100 Mage WizMage- Level 20 Enchanter- Level 60 Warlock or Wizard- Level 100 ArcherHawkArcher- Level 20 Scout- Level 60 Sharpshooter or Ranger- Level 100 System Requirements Minimum System Requirements: OS: Windows 200, Windows XP, Windows Vista CPU: Intel Pentium 3 (1.0GHz) or equivalent Memory: 512MB RAM HD Space: 1.8 GB Graphics: Nvidia GeForce MX/ Radeon 7500 Internet: DSL (128 kbps) or better Recommended System Specifications: OS: Windows 200, Windows XP, Windows Vista CPU: Intel Pentium 4 or equivalent Memory: 1.5MB RAM HD Space: 3 GB Graphics: Nvidia GeForce FX (or equivalent) Internet: DSL (256 kbps) or better
